text: Dysgonomonas mossii is a Gram-negative and facultatively anaerobic bacterium from the genus of Dysgonomonas which has been isolated from an abdominal drainage from a human from the Holy Cross Hospital in Detroit in the United States. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Dysgonomonas mossii at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacteroidetes Category:Bacteria described in 2002
title: Dysgonomonas mossii
